keyATM Base

Source: vignettes/pkgdown_files/keyATM_base.Rmd
keyATM_base.Rmd

Preparing documents

Please read Preparation for the three data types that keyATM can read. keyATM package includes a tidy dataset for illustration purpose. In this example, we use ***. You can load this data by data(keyATM_data_bills).

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)

Keywords

We set four keyword-topics. Keywrods should be stored in a list. Each element in the list is a character vector, which corresponds to a single keyword-topic.

bills_keywords <- list(
                       Education = c("education", "child", "student"),
                       Law       = c("court", "law", "attorney"),
                       Health    = c("public", "health", "program"),
                       Drug      = c("drug", "treatment")
                      )

Reading documents

Before fitting the model, we need to read texts and keywords into keyATM. Here we use quanteda’s dfm.

library(quanteda)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)

Checking keywords

Before you fit the model, please make sure your keywords appear enough in your corpus. FAQ explains what could be good keywords.

visualize_keywords(keyATM_docs, bills_keywords)

Fitting the model

out <- keyATM(docs              = keyATM_docs,    # text input
              no_keyword_topics = 3,              # number of topics without keywords
              keywords          = bills_keywords, # keywords
              model             = "base",         # select the model
              options           = list(seed = 100)
             )

The default number of iterations is 1500. Please check this page for available options.

Saving the model

Once you fit the model, you can save the model with save() for replication.

save(out, file="SAVENAME.rds")

To load the model, you can use load() function.

out <- load(file="SAVENAME.rds")

Checking top words

top_words(out)
##      1_Education        2_Law      3_Health     4_Drug     Other_1
## 1           loan      law [✓]   program [✓]    section    wildlife
## 2      child [✓]        state    health [✓]      shall  commission
